aboutMe: Hey, my name is Ashwin Talwalkar and I am a Computer Science major studying at the University of Wisconsin Madison!

interests.message: I love spending time swimming, watching/participating in atheltics, and weightlifting. In my downtime I enjoy reading Calvin & Hobbes and creating software for my community.
I participated in many clubs throughout high school including the Computer Science Club, Spartan Buddies, and the Indian Culture Club, and plan to join clubs similar in messages within college.
My swim career has caused me to pursue a certification in CPR, First-Aid, and lifeguarding.

rightNow.message:
As an freshmen at UW Madison, my class-load this semester includes: COMP SCI 300 - Programming II
,  COMP SCI 220 — Data Science Programming I
, PSYCH 202 — Introduction to Psychology
, HIST SCI 150 — The Digital Age

rightNow.title: Personal Projects
rightNow.message: As of right now I am working on projects that will help improve my progamming skills. I want to get more practice with TypeScript and the C family
